armor.name: Crude Viking Clothes
armor.description: Simple, rough-spun clothes and furs scavenged by G.R.A.C.E. to provide a basic disguise and protection from the cold.

accessory_1.name: Gel-Lined Viking Helmet
accessory_1.description: A crudely made iron helmet, padded with a strange, shock-absorbent purple gel. It feels strangely familiar.

active_traits.name: Lingual Symbiosis (G.R.A.C.E.)
active_traits.description: G.R.A.C.E. has shut down all non-essential functions to act as a living translator. You can understand and be understood by the local populace, but her processing power and assistance are gone.
